channel.title: Docker, images, clean, purge on Tiemen
channel.description: Recent content in Docker, images, clean, purge on Tiemen

item.title: Deleting ranges of Docker images using filters
item.description: If the output of docker images spans too many lines and you want to tidy it up, but you think docker system prune is like using C4 to open a can of tuna, maybe take docker images’s -f flag for a spin! docker images -f utilises the filter option and it lets you specify some extra search options to select exactly the images you’re interested in! Filter Options Currently Docker supports a list of filter options, but in this write-up we’re only focussing on the before and since filters - go for a full overview of the available filter options to the Docker Docs on Filtering
